attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am fed up of being charged a student fee or an adult fee when i am not even entitled to vote.
Why is it i am charged more because i have chosen to take on continued full time education?
Why is it i am charged an adult fare for many public services because my own student card does not have a date of birth?
Why should the government discriminate against me in this way?
